creator: halesm@hotmail.com
text:
It would be helpful if the Ant utils were created in union with jakarta commons
packages.  

This would allow the Ant tasks to be reused by everybody that uses jakarta
commons, and vice versa, producing a more powerful set of java libraries.

creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
text:
Ant is meant to be independent of jakarta commons.
There has been some discussions on
the ant-dev mailing list in the past.
